title: Finding the Right Co-Founder: Building Trust and Dividing Responsibilities
description: A conversation with aura co-founders about choosing the right partner when starting a business and the importance of trust in co-founder relationships.
summary: In this episode of Founder Facing, the host interviews Gautam Madon (CTO) and Purvi Goel (CEO) of aura, a company building autonomous HR solutions. They discuss how they divide responsibilities as co-founders, their approach to trust and communication, their experience hiring their first employee, and their sales and marketing strategies as an early-stage startup.
keyTopics: Importance of trust in co-founder relationships
Building autonomous HR solutions with AI
Strategies for making your first startup hire
Marketing and partnership strategies for B2B companies
